AREA 1...FROM YSC-110SE BGR-140ENE ACK-110ESE ACK-120SSE 
ACK-80SSW ACK-30SE ALB-40E MSS-YSC 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM TTH-30NNW LOZ-30SW GSO-50ESE RDU-40ESE ILM-70S 
ILM-CHS-40N ATL-BNA-50NNW PXV-TTH

PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
